layer.name: Responsibility
layer.definition: If it's in your life, it's yours to address.

questions.text: My spiritual growth is driven by ...

answers.4: me, though I lean on others more than I should
answers.5: me — I engage regardless of what others do or don't do
answers.2: programs and people; I engage when there's structure
answers.3: external structure mostly, though I contribute too
answers.1: my church, pastor, or spouse — they set the pace

questions.text: When my spiritual life feels dry, I ...

answers.4: dig into my own patterns, though I sometimes rearrange externals too
answers.5: ask what I am neglecting or avoiding
answers.2: adjust my circumstances — new app, new routine, new setting
answers.3: check myself briefly, then adjust my circumstances
answers.1: look for a new church, group, or environment to fix it

questions.text: When life gets full, my time with God ...
questions.principle: If it's to be, it's up to me

answers.4: is usually guarded, though urgent things occasionally displace it
answers.5: is non-negotiable — other things flex around it, not the reverse
answers.2: only happens when convenient; other priorities push it out
answers.3: sometimes survives, but often loses to other demands
answers.1: is first to go — almost anything bumps it

questions.text: Who I am today is the result of ...

answers.4: mostly my choices, though the past shaped me too
answers.5: what I choose to do with whatever happened — that's all mine
answers.2: circumstances that have set limits I can't really get past
answers.3: both my past and my choices — they each carry weight
answers.1: what I've been through — it makes sense given my past

answers.4: my engagement, but I sometimes get in my own way
answers.5: my reaching out to receive what God has already provided
answers.2: mostly God, though I have to be available
answers.3: I have to reach out to God, but He has to reach out to me
answers.1: God — if He wants me to grow, He'll make it happen
